title: Fast Algorithms for Quantile Regression with Selection
abstract: arXiv:2402.16693v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This paper addresses computational challenges in estimating Quantile Regression with Selection (QRS). The estimation of the parameters that model self-selection requires the estimation of the entire quantile process several times. Moreover, closed-form expressions of the asymptotic variance are too cumbersome, making the bootstrap more convenient to perform inference. Taking advantage of recent advancements in the estimation of quantile regression, along with some specific characteristics of the QRS estimation problem, I propose streamlined algorithms for the QRS estimator. These algorithms significantly reduce computation time through preprocessing techniques and quantile grid reduction for the estimation of the copula and slope parameters. translated_title: 具有选择的分位数回归的快速算法
translated_abstract: 本文解决了估计具有选择性的分位数回归（QRS）中的计算挑战。模型自选择的参数估计需要多次估计整个分位数过程。此外，渐近方差的闭合形式表达过于繁琐，使得使用自举法更方便进行推断。利用分位数回归估计的最新进展，以及QRS估计问题的一些特定特征，我提出了用于QRS估计器的简化算法。这些算法通过预处理技术和减少分位格网来显着减少计算时间，用于估计联合分布和斜率参数。我展示了一些模拟中的优化增强。最后，我展示了预处理方法如何提高估计的精度而不牺牲计算效率。因此，
tldr: 提出了针对具有选择性的分位数回归（QRS）估计的简化算法，通过预处理技术和分位格网减少计算时间，优化估计精度。
